sentence: The internal dynamics: The panel's Republican vice chairwoman, Rep. LIZ CHENEY of Wyoming, has led the charge in holding Mr. Trump to account for his efforts to overturn the election, but has wanted to avoid any aggressive effort that, in her view, could unfairly target Justice Thomas.? The double-standard concerns: If the committee does not summon Ms. Thomas, some legal analysts said, it runs the risk of appearing to have a double standard.
title: POLITICO Playbook: The Ginni Thomas story grows larger
